timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyText:
I think this should be an INTERNAL span, from https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-specification/blob/master/specification/trace/api.md#spankind:

INTERNAL Default value. Indicates that the span represents an internal operation within an application, as opposed to an operations with remote parents or children.
